scripts.start:tests:eth: cd tests && aqua -i eth_tests.aqua -o eth_tests.air -a && cd .. && for i in tests/eth_tests.air/*.air; do fldist run_air -p $i -d '{"node":"12D3KooWEgj11c9Urfw5pAt6ukSdMVFv2Ynk4jc5QLdWvqh2UPpB"}' --generated; done
scripts.start:tests:utils: cd tests && aqua -i utils_tests.aqua -o utils_tests.air -a && cd .. && for i in tests/utils_tests.air/*.air; do fldist run_air -p $i -d '{"node":"12D3KooWEgj11c9Urfw5pAt6ukSdMVFv2Ynk4jc5QLdWvqh2UPpB"}' --generated; done
scripts.start:tests:web3: cd tests && aqua -i web3_tests.aqua -o web3_tests.air -a && cd .. && for i in tests/web3_tests.air/*.air; do fldist run_air -p $i -d '{"node":"12D3KooWEgj11c9Urfw5pAt6ukSdMVFv2Ynk4jc5QLdWvqh2UPpB"}' --generated; done
scripts.start:tests:bzz: cd tests && aqua -i bzz_tests.aqua -o bzz_tests.air -a && cd .. && for i in tests/bzz_tests.air/*.air; do fldist run_air -p $i -d '{"node":"12D3KooWEgj11c9Urfw5pAt6ukSdMVFv2Ynk4jc5QLdWvqh2UPpB"}' --generated; done
scripts.start:tests:contract: cd tests && aqua -i contract_tests.aqua -o contract_tests.air -a && cd .. && for i in tests/contract_tests.air/*.air; do fldist run_air -p $i -d '{"node":"12D3KooWEgj11c9Urfw5pAt6ukSdMVFv2Ynk4jc5QLdWvqh2UPpB"}' --generated; done
scripts.compile:tests: cd tests && aqua -i bzz_tests.aqua -o bzz_tests.air -a && aqua -i utils_tests.aqua -o utils_tests.air -a && aqua -i eth_tests.aqua -o eth_tests.air -a && aqua -i bzz_tests.aqua -o bzz_tests.air -a && aqua -i web3_tests.aqua -o web3_tests.air -a
